event.title: Experimental rewards
event.description:
We have good news for you! You have been selected to receive extra money for taking part in the experiment. Congratulations.
We will double the amount of money you will get. In other words, you will get 100 RMB for taking part in the experiment.
You will receive the extra money of 50 RMB straight away. After the experiment, the Research Assistant will present you with the extra money.
event.description_en:
We have good news for you! You have been selected to receive extra money for taking part in the experiment. Congratulations.
We will double the amount of money you will get. In other words, you will get 100 RMB for taking part in the experiment.
You will receive the extra money of 50 RMB straight away. After the experiment, the Research Assistant will present you with the extra money.

event.title: Experimental rewards (red tape)
event.description:
We have good news for you! You have been selected to receive extra money for taking part in the experiment. Congratulations.
We will double the amount of money you will get. In other words, you will get 100 RMB for taking part in the experiment.
You will receive the extra money of 50 RMB by the earliest after 30 days, following university regulations and procedures. It will be transferred to your bank account. 
The Research Assistant will provide you further instructions after the experiment so we can make the transfer. 
Following university regulations and procedures, you also need to fill in your demographic information again to get the extra money.
event.description_en:
We have good news for you! You have been selected to receive extra money for taking part in the experiment. Congratulations.
We will double the amount of money you will get. In other words, you will get 100 RMB for taking part in the experiment.
You will receive the extra money of 50 RMB by the earliest after 30 days, following university regulations and procedures. It will be transferred to your bank account. 
The Research Assistant will provide you further instructions after the experiment so we can make the transfer. 
Following university regulations and procedures, you also need to fill in your demographic information again to get the extra money.
